channel.title: People and Events on Homicide in Chicago 1870-1930
channel.description: Recent content in People and Events on Homicide in Chicago 1870-1930

item.title: Julius Duc
item.description: Half-length portrait of Julius Duc wearing a woman's blouse, skirt and wig sitting in a chair in a police station with a man in the background looking into the room from a doorway in Chicago, Illinois. Full-length portrait of Julius Duc wearing a woman's blouse, skirt and wig standing in a room in a police station in Chicago, Illinois with a man standing against a wall in the background.

item.title: The Eastland Disaster
item.description: Bird's-eye view of crowd at the Eastland disaster site, standing behind a police line on LaSalle Street looking south from Water Street Market in the Loop community area of Chicago, Illinois. Two for rent signs are visible on the building on the left side of the image. Bird's-eye view of crowd at the Eastland disaster, standing behind a police line on North LaSalle Street looking south from Water Street Market in the Loop community area of Chicago, Illinois.
